subject: RE: JIM C Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Lots of evps this morning
author: Al Harris
full_text:
Hi Jim,

Yes, I was going to stop but then some experienced members at another
group (RTSC) explained how I could protect myself from the negative
entities. Do you believe I'm putting myself & family at risk? My
questions have been "Hi, is anyone there?" rather than asking for
direct information or seeking contact with a specific person.

Thanks,
Al

On 12/8/09, g.guzzi <vet7id@...> wrote:
> I thought you were going to stop conducting research
> in your home due to prior negative results.
>
> Jim C.
